cause.description:
Global Warming is out of Control, and there is only ONE man to do it! CAPTAIN PLANET!!!
1. Global Warming is going to keep getting worse without him
2. We know this man can stop it
3. Captain Planet has the goods, but does he have the GUTS to come back??
cause.mission: Coax Captain Planet from retirement to Save the planet from Global Warming
cause.name: Bring Captain Planet back to Stop Global Warming!
